_description: On the Uncertainty of Earthly Life — in rhyme royal

BodArcSelB24.First Lines:
Thy begynning Is barane brutelnessWith wrechitnes wofull away thou
                    w[ ]…
BodArcSelB24.Last Lines:
…And this but contrair th[ ]Quho leste lere craist[
                    ]
BodArcSelB24.Note: Ends of lines lost to damaged gutter.
BodArcSelB24.Facsimiles:
Boffey,  Julia,  and  A. S. G. Edwards, eds.  
             Chaucer, Works. Bodleian Library MS Arch Selden B.24: Facsimile
                Edition.
         Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1995.
BodArcSelB24.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 237-8.

Banna.First Lines:
Thy begynnyng is bair and bittirnesWith wrechitnes wofull away thow
                    wendis…
Banna.Last Lines:
…quhat heis is heirof bot chr cast on chryst
                    thy cureAnd god stand content of euery aventur
